title: ID alternative font
content:
Hi everyone, does anyone know about a free font like Tj Evolette A?  
I'm especially looking for something like the alternative letters in these sets.

[http://26plus-zeichen.de/fonts/tj-evolette-a/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015104926/http:/26plus-zeichen.de/fonts/tj-evolette-a/ "http://26plus-zeichen.de/fonts/tj-evolette-a/")
author: allefio

comments.content:
not only is this a unique font with unique attributes, I'd say that most here are going to be reluctant to suggest anything like what you are asking for. "free" fonts tend to be ripoffs or just plain poor quality. frankly, it's a cool font and if you really like it, $30 isn't much.

[http://www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T1795](http://web.archive.org/web/20131015104926/http:/www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T1795 "http://www.youworkforthem.com/product.php?sku=T1795")

Jodie, thank you for being a good influence.

hhp
